slug.login_required_for_request: To submit a request, please log in or sign up first.
slug.secure_payment_info: By enabling secure payment in Rira, the deposit or rent is temporarily held by the platform and will only be released to the owner after the tenant receives the property and confirms. This increases mutual trust and prevents fraud.
slug.early_cancellation_info:
Early termination of the contract is only possible with written notice at least [e.g., 30 days] before the move-out date.
If the contract is terminated unilaterally without notice, the landlord/tenant may follow up through the platform support.
If termination occurs before the start of occupancy, the deposit may be refunded in full or partially (based on the initial agreement).
slug.rent_payment_info:
Rent must be paid [e.g., monthly/quarterly] at the beginning of each period.
At the start of the contract, a deposit amount of [e.g., $1,000] must be paid separately.
If using Rira Secure Payment, the deposit will remain blocked on the platform until the property is fully delivered and confirmed by the tenant.
slug.lease_duration_info:
The lease agreement is signed for a period of [e.g., 12 months].
At the end of this period, the contract may be renewed by mutual agreement.
If either party wishes to terminate earlier, the early termination conditions (above) will apply.
slug.official_contract_info:
The contract type can be official / manual / digital agreement.
The contract file will be prepared and signed in two languages (Persian and the destination country language).
A printed paper version can also be provided upon request.
slug.rental_required_docs: To rent this property, the following documents are required:
slug.doc_passport: Copy of passport or residence card
slug.doc_income: Proof of employment or income (if required)
slug.doc_phone_verification: Valid phone number and identity verification on the platform
slug.doc_additional: In special cases, additional documents may be requested by the landlord.
slug.request_info: By sending this request, the property owner will be notified of your interest.
slug.request_text_placeholder: You can write your request message here if needed
slug.request_success: Your request has been sent successfully.
slug.request_failed: Your request could not be sent!!
slug.already_requested: You have already submitted a request for this!

roommate.secure_payment_description: By activating secure payment in Rira, the deposit or rent amount will first be temporarily held on the platform and will only be paid to the owner after the property is delivered and confirmed by the tenant. This method increases mutual trust and prevents fraud.

business.secure_payment_info: By activating secure payment on Rira, the deposit or rent amount is temporarily held on the platform and will only be released to the owner after the property is delivered and confirmed by the tenant. This method increases mutual trust and helps prevent fraud.
